#include<iostream>
#include<stack>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>s;
              string exp;
              stack<char>st;
              for(i=0;i<s.size();i++)
              {
                                     if(s[i]=='(')
                                     {
                                                  st.push(s[i]);
                                     }
                                     else if(s[i]==')')
                                     {
                                                  while(st.top()!='(')
                                                  {
                                                                      exp+=st.top();
                                                                      st.pop();
                                                  }
                                                  st.pop();
                                     }
                                     else if (s[i]>=97 && s[i]<=122)
                                     {
                                                  exp+=s[i];
                                     }
                                     else if(s[i]=='+' || s[i]=='-' || s[i]=='*' || s[i]=='/' || s[i]=='^')
                                     {
                                                  st.push(s[i]);
                                     }
              }
              cout<<exp;
              cout<<"\n";
    }
}
